line_1: And much of hope she to herself derived,
line_2: So on they went, her cheerless heart revived

line_1: This from our martial board deriv'd,
line_2: More pleas'd to view our deeds by thee reviv'd,

line_1: " Of this soft Heart, from whence all are deriv'd
line_2: "Compare thyself in this same hour depriv'd
